flawed_nl_solution:
Vanessa needs $80 - $20 = $<<80-20=60>>60 to buy the dress.
She manages to gather $30 - $10 = $<<30-10=30>>30 each week
The number of weeks she has to wait is 60 / 30 = <<60/30=2>>2 weeks.
#### 2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 30. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
